content.text:
**Jennifer Garcia** is an artist, engineer, and organizer. Through her work she has [put things in space](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GOES_15), drawn characters for [an Emmy-winning show](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Archer_(2009_TV_series)), and been in the trenches of [struggle for worker power](https://www.cartoonbrew.com/artist-rights/workers-at-atlantas-floyd-county-productions-the-studio-behind-archer-move-to-unionize-202857.html). For most of her life she was conflicted about how to apply her talents, but it was through union organizing that she finally found direction. She's now working with several organizations to help people come into their voice and realize their power. Those efforts will hopefully come to fruition over the coming weeks, months, and years. Jen is from Puerto Rico and lives [ITP of Atlanta](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Interstate_285_(Georgia)) with a loving partner and a good dog. ### This Site Development is still [underway](https://github.com/cuibonobo/cuibonobo.com), but this is a statically-generated site that is hosted on [CloudFlare](https://pages.cloudflare.com/). ### Contact
